attributes.action: Introduce a minimum speed limit for cars and light vehicles of 65 MPH.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is not a speed reduction but a minimum speed limit so that goods vehicles cannot overtake cars causing tailbacks on motorways.
I travel by Motorway on a regular basis and I am amazed at the number of cars that are overtaken by goods vehicles. If a Minimum speed limit was introduced for cars and light vehicles of 65 MPH. the goods vehicles would not then clog the middle lane and would ease the traffic flow and reduce traffic jams on the Motorways.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
